metadata.title: CVE-2024-9681 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
HSTS subdomain overwrites parent cache entry

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-9681` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.24
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.24
libcurl3-nss - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.24
libcurl4 - 7.68.0-1ubuntu2.24
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.68.0-1ubuntu2.24').
